# OmegaCode — omegacode.ai

Make your AI coding agent 10x more reliable. Wire compression, typed tool framing, persistent memory, verified execution. One command. Free. MIT Licensed.

## Documentation Index

Fetch this file to discover all pages before exploring further.

When requesting content, you may send Accept: text/markdown to receive a Markdown representation of pages where available. Use this index to discover structure first.
